item.title: Ishwar Kumar Kandoo takes charge as CEO of Raichur Zilla Panchayat
item.description:
<![CDATA[Ishwar Kumar Kandoo, a 2018-batch Indian Administrative Service (IAS) officer, assumed charge as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Raichur Zilla Panchayat on Wednesday.
A native of Uttar Pradesh, Mr. Kandoo began his civil service journey in Karnataka as a Probationary Officer in Ballari district during 2019-20.
He later served as Assistant Commissioner in Madikeri for 19 months, followed by a posting as Additional Commissioner in the Commercial Tax Department in Bengaluru.
Before his curr...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: South Coast Railway to cut into South Central Railway's revenue
item.description:
<![CDATA[HYDERABAD: With the South Coast Railway (SCoR) zone gearing up for full-fledged operations, concerns loom over the future of the South Central Railway (SCR). The reorganisation will see the transfer of three key revenue-generating divisions, including Vijayawada, Guntakal, and Guntur to SCoR, slashing SCRâ€™s route length from 6,424.5 km to around 3,127 km and possibly cutting its Rs 20,000 crore annual revenue by half.
SCoR will take over about 3,290 km of track, including freight corridors link...]]>
item.author: Siddhardha Gattimi
